column5: Went back up to the grand with my friends and finally got a walleye nothing huge but i was a happy.We caught 5 walleye 2 bass and a rock bass.This is my biggest.
Nice fish John, you gotta love the Grand river, anywhere you fish it.
ya it's a great river I love when people say that its dirty and one of the worst rivers that just leaves more fish for me.
The first one is always the hardest. They will come easier now
Nice catch....   Looks really healthy to me
Ah the venerable Walleye. The gentleman of fish.  Pure gold I tell ya!
where on the grand my son?
Congrats on your first pickerel. Must have been a great feeling.Thanks for sharing.
Congrats on your first of many I'm sure!  It's always great to work at targeting a species and having it finally pay off.  I know the feeling!
